DOC.brief_summary: Healthy volunteer without concussion , currently participate non-or-limited contact sport team Emory University undergo Display Enhanced Testing Concussion mild traumatic brain injury ( mTBI ) ( DETECT ) three separate day : baseline , day 50 , day 90 . Prior enrollment participant allocate test-retest arm exercise arm .
DOC.criteria: age > = 16 eligible active participation National Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA ) season member 2011 2012 20122013 club team Participation non minimal contact sport < age 16 history concussion previous 6 month follow : learn disability , attention deficient disorder , attention deficit hyperactivity disorder , depression psychiatric disorder , sleep apnea , seizure disorder , migraine headache , previous central nervous system ( CNS ) surgery chronic drug alcohol use ; drug alcohol use previous 24 hour inability complete study protocol ( 90 day )
